interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: SENGOLOGY Water Flosser Professional Countertop Flosser Dental Oral Irrigator -Rechargeable 12 Modes Water Flossing with Cleanable Water Tank for Home, Braces & Bridges Care Review Date: 2019/11/05 Store: SENSOLOGY Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'SENSOLOGY', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Special Feature': 'Portable, Multiple Operation Modes', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Tank Volume': '700 Milliliters', 'Package Dimensions': '8.74 x 6.57 x 5.08 inches; 1.96 Pounds', 'UPC': '850004585177', 'Manufacturer': 'SENSOLOGY'} Review Text: This is a good water flosser . I’m comparing it to others I have owned. The last one I had did not last long- this appears to be better made and it just looks nicer overall. The water well holds a fair amount of water however I would like it to hold a bit more. It has many levels of power for the water to spray out. The low is very weak and the high is pretty darn strong and could be painful if you aren’t careful. There are plenty of adjustments in between so you will find one that suits your mouth just right. It also has a “massage “ button which basically cuts down the strength of the jet and makes it pulse to massage your gums. I find it a bit too soft of my gums , even on the highest level. This product does a great job in cleaning between your teeth and below gum line. I hate to floss so this is a great option to keep my teeth clean and well cared for. If your house is Not new and only has one plug in your bathroom, you will appreciate the long cords- both the electrical and the water hose. One thing I like about this water flosser is that it does NOT leak like my other one did. This keeps my counter neat. This is a good product to add to your daily dental hygiene regimen . It is easy and does a great job cleaning .
* If you found this review helpful please click the button below to let Amazon know. Thanks ! Review Title: Better than flossing or brushing alone! Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Embryolisse Eau de Beaute Rosamelis Face Toner, 6.76 Fl Oz {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.85 x 2.76 x 7.44 inches; 8.11 Ounces', 'Item model number': '501000', 'Manufacturer': 'Embryolisse'} I love that the toner is in a spray bottle. I wish the instructions were in A bit more clear. I do not know if you are supposed to spray it on your face and go or use a cotton pad. I do not feel a tightening on my skin like most toners. It leaves my skin soft and it smells wonderful! I have just been spraying it on my face after washing and I like that it’s easier, quicker and less waste when you don’t need a cotton pad. Quick, easy to apply -wonderful smelling toner! It is easy and does a great job cleaning .

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Values skincare products, especially toners that are user-friendly and facilitate easy application.
- **Application Method:** Prefers spray format for convenience, demonstrating a desire for quick and efficient usage without needing additional tools.
- **Sensory Experience:** Appreciates pleasant scents in skincare, seeking enjoyable fragrances that enhance the routine.
- **Skin Feel:** Prefers products that soften the skin and remains open to varied outcomes, including tightening effects.
- **Desire for Clarity:** Values clear instructions on product usage, emphasizing the need for guidance when selecting and using skincare items.
- **Ease of Use:** Exhibits a consistent preference for straightforward application methods that simplify the skincare routine. 

- **Expanded Interests:** Recently explored dental hygiene products, showing a commitment to maintaining overall personal care. This indicates an interest in effective, easy-to-use tools that enhance daily routines, similar to preferences in their skincare regimen. Prioritizes convenience and efficiency in dental care options as well.

Overall, this user prioritizes a practical and sensory-driven approach to both skincare and dental hygiene, emphasizing ease of use, enjoyable experiences, and clarity in product application while actively seeking effective solutions that integrate seamlessly into daily routine.
